text: Stara Białka () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lubawka, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately north-west of Lubawka, south-west of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. Image:Stara Białka, kapliczka.jpg|Przydrożna kapliczka. Image:Stara Białka, brama w murze otaczającym kościól pw. św. title: Stara Białka
